website_summaries.verdict: This midsize microwave still provides plenty of cooking options while going a little easier on the budget.
pros: Fits well in smaller spaces, and black exterior goes with most kitchens
Users like that it beeps quietly 3 times when the cycle is done, then stops
cons: Some users find it somewhat loud
Light doesn't stay on when door is opened

customer_reviews.title: No light when door is open— not safe!
customer_reviews.text: This oven is not safe. The light is only on during cooking and NOT when the door is open. You cannot see inside to reach for HOT items. There is always the danger of spills in any microwave. Unable to see inside to clean it. So far, I am using a flashlight to be able to see inside. Unfortunately, I did not save the packing materials or I would certainly return it. Sharp Carousel has been around for years but this one is not a good product. I can’t imagine why the manufacturer would design a product this way. Amazon should not sell it any more!
customer_reviews.author: MaineMom

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE! I have never had a microwave oven stop suddenly. This one does, can't cook for more than 10 minutes at any one time. I suspect it overheats and would burn down my house if it didn't stop. The microwave sits on my countertop alone, nothing to block it from the sides or top, and away from the backsplash. This is terribly defective. Stay away!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Green

customer_reviews.title: Return for credit asap
customer_reviews.text: Older version had 3 arm turntable guide. New one has ring,turntable very unstable, 0 stars! Return for credit.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed, control panel is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Had another sharp microwave for years, good product. But this one is a nightmare to use. Overly complicated touch controls. The touch often doesn’t register. You cannot program a specific number of minutes and seconds. My popcorn is perfect at 2:22, so with this I have to choose 3 minutes then hover to shut it off at the best time. Older model was great but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas F. Staples

customer_reviews.title: Compact and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size and gets the job done. It's much lighter than the one it replaced and I like the light touch the controls have. I've gotten used to not having a light go upon opening which many customers found disconcerting. I find the power settings a bit tricky but overall am quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: anna banana

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Sharp microwave because it was the same one that l previously owned for many years. Of course it's been upgraded, but it's not as solid as the one l had. In fact it's quite tinny. I'm satisfied with the 1000 watts. It heats up well. The panel directions are easy + self explanatory. I didn't even have to read directions. The only problem was it took so long to be delivered, but the seller was quite accomodating. I haven't had it that long...so far so good, but I'm keeping the box just in case.
customer_reviews.author: helen c.

customer_reviews.title: Too many negatives to recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Okay microwave, however: 1. Pad Buttons are extremely hard to see - black on black. What were they thinking? You need a flashlight. 2. Cord is too damn short. Unless your unit is right next to a socket, you're going to have to buy a powerful enough extension cord. Why do they always do this?
customer_reviews.author: Quintis Arrius

customer_reviews.title: Be Sharp, Microwave it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Sharp Microwave Oven of exactly the same size and power. The old one lasted 15 years and I finally got tired of looking at it and donated it to Good Will, but it was still operating perfectly. You should note that in this unit you have to hit the power button once before setting the time--the instructions are not very clear about that.
customer_reviews.author: Evan W. La Rue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microwave
customer_reviews.text: Cooks evenly and runs extremely quiet. I had an older version of this unit, but it ran so loudly compared to this one. The programming is easy - quick programming with 1, 2, or 3 minutes and can add 30 seconds as needed. Cooks everything from popcorn to potatoes, defrosts meats/veggies, great for reheating and for cooking fast meals, like a pot pie.
customer_reviews.author: Trygzus

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: First unit was defective.. second didn't last more than a few months. Dangerous issue as well, microwave won't turn off unless unplugged. For the amount it costs it shouldn't be this defective.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani

customer_reviews.title: You Kidding me ?
customer_reviews.text: The worst. hard to believe anybody had the nerve to put junk this on the market. In decipherable controls; a rotation that mostly doesn't rotate; Really sorry I didn't do a lot more research before wasting my money.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: No interior light
customer_reviews.text: This was the latest model of the version I had that was some 20 years old. For some reason they decided to remove the interior light when you open the door The light works when the oven is in operation. But when removing hot food from a dark box it makes no sense. Probably a great microwave otherwise. I'll never KNOW. The oven was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: One or two minutes is fine. Five or more is when it becomes a ...
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged (from factory, not by Amazon delivery). In the past couple of months, it stops while cooking, but you can't do anything. The display is blacked out. The timer continues to work in the background, and once it has completed the time, it will ding. Then I can start it again, to finish the cooking...but it may stop again, and have to repeat! One or two minutes is fine. Five or more is when it becomes a problem. Yeah, you get what you pay for, but I won't buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Calamity

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love an appliance that does it's job!
customer_reviews.text: So, we have one of these microwaves at my work and it is my favorite! It heats up lunch evenly and quickly. When our old microwave went out I was excited to purchase this one in its place and it has not disappointed us! My son was thrilled with how it pop corn efficiency (leaves very few kernels behind without burning!) And I just love how evenly it cooks dishes. This is a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: I Make Stuff

customer_reviews.title: REPLACED A 30 YEAR OLD WORKING MICROWAVE
customer_reviews.text: My old microwave still worked but it did not have a turntable. I'm over seventy and I found this product easy to use, and not that much noise. I like products that work without the drama.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M. S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Only 4 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for approximately two weeks now and notice that when trying to press to open it sticks. The other reason for only 4 stars is that the light does not come on when opening the door so there is some difficulty in trying to making your selections since there is no light for the display.
customer_reviews.author: DebiLou

customer_reviews.title: Super LOUD
customer_reviews.text: This thing is so LOUD. I have owned at least 8 microwaves in my lifetime (cheap and expensive) and this is the LOUDEST I’ve ever owned. It works well enough but I would caution the buyer to pick something else. I’ve had cheaper low quality microwaves that were not scary loud.
customer_reviews.author: jm

customer_reviews.title: Best microwave I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this microwave! I was weary spending that much money on something that got so many "ify" reviews. But everything cooks evenly and inside and out cleans up nice. As for the whole thing with the light not being on when the door is open, not a big deal. Stop being lazy and pull your food out and look at it, sheesh. Nothing bad to say about this at all!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teya Ross

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful unit, great price, nice size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use at work where size and speed are my two main focuses. 1100 watts is only 100 more than most other microwaves of comparable size (1.0 cu ft). I've owned other sharp models and I've never had a complain. Taken care should last 10yrs or so. I like how it looks in my office. Cooks food thoroughly slightly faster than other brands. Overall it was a good buy. Its wide and not too tall which fits my space situation.
customer_reviews.author: San Andreas Customs

customer_reviews.title: no light when the door is open
customer_reviews.text: I will never again buy a microwave sight unseen. It is smaller then I like. The light doesn't come on when the door is open. The timer beeps 3 beeps when it is finished & never reminds me again, don't like that. My husband loves it fir all of the reasons I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Bought for RV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2003 BT Cruiser RV. Fit the surround and mount perfect and works great! Way more powerful for the same size as well.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Steward

customer_reviews.title: Microwave Problems.
customer_reviews.text: Please do not buy this microwave. I ordered this for my parents for Christmas in December of last year and it has already gone out. Amazon did nothing wrong in this case as they are only the middle man. Sharp has chosen to handle this situation in the worst of ways by taking their time in resolving the issue. Please do not purchase any Sharp products unless you are expecting less than an acceptable resolution process should a problem occur. While I do understand that problems occur from time to time, the way a problem is resolved means a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud Buzzing Sound - Drives Me Crazy!
customer_reviews.text: This microwave does what a microwave is supposed to do - it heats up food. But it has a loud buzzing sound from the frame that you just can't get over. Would have returned it if I hadn't been in the rush of a move and thrown the box out. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amaz0n Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: barely made it 9 months, then started heating things poorly and finally crapped out. update: Sharp replaced the first with no charge. However, that one is now arcing like the first did. I'm done with Sharp products.
customer_reviews.author: brasko

customer_reviews.title: Don't hold your breath!
customer_reviews.text: Weirdly, this microwave worked great the first time we used it, then stopped heating completely. My husband messed with it and eventually just unplugged it, and when we plugged it back in, it started working again. It's been fine now for the month or so we've had it, but I'm not holding my breath . . . why can't these companies make a decent machine anymore?
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Latimer

customer_reviews.title: next we buy .....
customer_reviews.text: just need to bad stuff and then the FBI can come Knocking.....hehehe i wanna see if they show up....loll OLD MAN!!
customer_reviews.author: OLD MAN KNOWS TECH

customer_reviews.title: UGH!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working tonight. Not even one year old yet! We will see what Customer Service will do about this.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not the best mircowave.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look since it matches my kitchen perfectly. However, this is my second one because the first on clitched out. If it was not for the look I would probably not buy this particular microwave. The newer one has already started to act up. Good thing is that I always buy the extended warranty plans so I can have microwave fixed or replaced if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not well enginere
customer_reviews.text: I had an older model of this one for years, this one is not as good, the roller on the bottom kept come out, the old one was center in the middle to keep everything in place.
customer_reviews.author: dyno

customer_reviews.title: Microwave died in less than one year
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in October. The microwave gets used a lot in our house, but even so I was stunned when it simply died the following July. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Wilson

customer_reviews.title: But overall it works great and fit perfectly where I needed it
customer_reviews.text: I wish the light turned on when you opened the door, not just when it's working. But overall it works great and fit perfectly where I needed it. Love the +30 second button for quick heat-ups.
customer_reviews.author: Kmonster

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Microwave
customer_reviews.text: My Sharp microwave has served me well since I received it a month or so ago. It is a basic model, but performs all the functions I require of a microwave. The only thing I miss is a timer.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Hardy

customer_reviews.title: let me say that I am very satisfied with Amazon in general
customer_reviews.text: First of all, let me say that I am very satisfied with Amazon in general.. I don't always take the time to respond and write a review because I am just too busy. The reason I am giving this product a poor review is because it makes the most horrible noise every time I turn it on. Most likely a manufacturing problem. I have not returned it because I was out of town and not able to deal with this issue. Hopefully I can still exchange the product and come back with an excellent review!
customer_reviews.author: Mesquite

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price! And powerful too!
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave so far. We bought it to replace a Wal-mart special that caught on fire. With prime, it was here within two days, so we didn't have to miss out on our microwave popcorn and whatnot for very long. It seems really powerful, and hasn't disappointed me yet! Looks really nice too, so that's a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Harris

customer_reviews.title: sharp carousel R-331ZS Microwave Oven
customer_reviews.text: Works well and looks great. The only thing I don`t like is that there is no light inside, otherwise I would have given it a 5 star rating. Karin L. Herrick
customer_reviews.author: Karin L. Herrick

customer_reviews.text: So far am loving my microwave. Main purpose is to reheat food/drinks. Surprisingly it arrived way earlier than was eta'd.
customer_reviews.author: YOLANDA CAZARES

customer_reviews.title: Hey, it works
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It has not broken. I am now on my third one after many many years. I stay with the same box although the brand name changes.
customer_reviews.author: Sunlightening

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I loved this microwave. Had it 2 years then last night it just blows up without warning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that person alone with not much space !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter. It is perfect for 1 and fit very nicely on her limited counter space !!
customer_reviews.author: Anne M Richard

customer_reviews.title: Fits cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Fits in cabinet occupied by a micro that died. This has smaller dimension front to back and doesn't hang over edge of cabinet as the new ones would
customer_reviews.author: Piper

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Only had a light when it's cooking and after about a year and a half if I cook something longer than 7 minutes it shuts down completely for about 45 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: it works great.
customer_reviews.text: Not very intuitive how to set a custom time (you have to push power first) but I think a lot of microwaves have that issue, and in terms of actual function, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: BBB

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as older models
customer_reviews.text: I've had three or four carousels over the years. This one is built cheap and the numbers are not lit.. So at night with no lights on you have to use a flastlight to find the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: deering123

customer_reviews.title: We broke the glass plate in our microwave and couldn't ...
customer_reviews.text: We broke the glass plate in our microwave and couldn't find a replacement for a reasonable price so we bought another microwave. This one performs perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Our last microwave was a Sharp and ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Our last microwave was a Sharp and we had it for 12 years. Hope for the same experience with this one. Very pleased and highly recommended. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Sparks and flames
customer_reviews.text: Was great for a few months but started sparking with flames when making microwave popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: OK for a year (aka warranty period). Then...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in Feb 2017. By March 2018 the electrical failed causing humming, zapping, and a burnt plastic smell. Juuuust conveniently outside of warranty. Low quality, will not buy Sharp again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rooker

customer_reviews.title: 30 sec's to find.
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, I wish I went up one size.That's my fault thou.Only thing i'd like to see is specialty buttons actuated a little.
customer_reviews.author: HuffyR

customer_reviews.title: Shop around more!
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from a Sharp Microwave. I had older comparably priced models over the years and unfortunately the quality has changed with the times. This model is very cheaply constructed and the buttons aren't as smooth. A big disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: beverly s. j.

customer_reviews.title: Great value microwave
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful unit that just fit our smaller space, but gave us more power and ease of use than anything before.
customer_reviews.author: New Creation

customer_reviews.title: This is a decent microwave.
customer_reviews.text: It cooks well and the defrost (by weight ) works really well also as it defrosts without partially cooking the frozen item.It is not overloaded with options nor is it difficult to learn to use. The expected performance that is a Sharp product. It, however, does not have a kitchen timer built in it. I do miss that.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E.

customer_reviews.title: Old reliable
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many of these over the years. Have never been let down. I like the fact that the carousel actually carousels (turns), as it means food is more likely to be consistently warmed. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This arrived on time and is great so far. Looks sleek and fits in with my other stainless steal appliances. Is a greAt size and does what it's suppose to. Not to mention the price was great compared to other microwaves of the same size in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Lissette Bonilla

customer_reviews.title: sharp microwave
customer_reviews.text: great oven, just the right size, looks like stainless steel. Would recomend to anyone. Great price for the unit. Only thing that would be nice is if the light came on when the door is opened, not just when the machine is running.
customer_reviews.author: gregory

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: Since this was a gift I have no first-hand knowledge about this microwave. However, my disabled daughter reports that it works well and the controls are easy for her to understand and manage.
customer_reviews.author: janets98

customer_reviews.title: minimal use of microwaves
customer_reviews.text: I use a microwave for heating up frozen foods or reheating cooked foods. At times I will use it to heat up water for making tea or popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Heats about the same as any other microwave I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: Heats about the same as any other microwave I've used. Is made in China. DOes not have a timer function.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: It was fine for 11 months and then started arcing for no known reason. Every microwave I have had previously lasted for many years. I will not be replacing this with another Sharp.
customer_reviews.author: mjnaber

customer_reviews.title: Excellent medium-sized microwave
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this model based on the wattage -900 - and the dimensions as it needed to be small enough to fit a tight counter space yet large enough to fit a decent-sized dish or food item. The carousel is a little smaller than a previous Sharp model I had, but is big enough for my purposes. The unit has easy-to-understand and read controls, and is fairly quiet when running. The sleek design and black with stainless steel trim matches my refrigerator exactly.
customer_reviews.author: Barb in Fla.

customer_reviews.title: certain quirks I miss from my old GE like beeping after sitting in oven for a min
customer_reviews.text: certain quirks I miss from my old GE like beeping after sitting in oven for a min. or two, also no light on buttons for nite time usage
customer_reviews.author: Bob Katt

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Love sharp microwaves had the for the past 40 years. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased With It
customer_reviews.text: I was exactly what I expected. I am VERY pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so fsr so good.
customer_reviews.text: I just got this last week and so far no complaints. heats quickly and not real loud when in use.
customer_reviews.author: catskills cook

customer_reviews.title: Performs as well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers, I miss having a light inside the oven when the door is open. Otherwise, I believe this model sustains Sharp's usual high standards for microwave ovens. I'm a little concerned about its life-expectancy, based on the comments of others, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: John Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and as described. Great size and easy to read buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Joann L. Allen

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: purchased on May 31, 2017 : stopped working the beginning of August 2017
customer_reviews.author: louis o

customer_reviews.title: dont waste your money I'm going with Whirlpool
customer_reviews.text: stopped working after a few weeks........dont waste your money I'm going with Whirlpool next
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! I am delighted w/it. I like that it alerts you when product is done but doesn't keep beeping.
customer_reviews.author: Morrine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cooking area in a small package. One touch quick start for 1-5 minutes is convenient
customer_reviews.author: SocalMorr

customer_reviews.title: Catches fire!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it a 0 I would. I got this microwave for my grandma and it caught on fire today. My cousin had to put out the flames. I thank god my cousin was there to act quickly as my grandma isn’t to quick.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for our church snack room to replace ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our church snack room to replace and old one. Works well and delivery was quick.
customer_reviews.author: Philip M.

customer_reviews.title: Alright but,
customer_reviews.text: Noisy, no cooking features. The numbers are also hard to see without bright lighting.
customer_reviews.author: Loon Watcher

customer_reviews.title: I do not like this microwave
customer_reviews.text: I do not like this microwave. It sounds like tin - sounds cheap. I don't like the turntable either.
customer_reviews.author: Bay Island Babe

customer_reviews.title: microwave review
customer_reviews.text: So far so good had the same model before lasted 5 years hope this one does the same
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived and did not work. I was fiven ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived and did not work. I was fiven a full refund within 24 hours with an apology email and told to discard the unit.... so I was stuck with a microwave I now have to pay to get rid of..
customer_reviews.author: Jc Legitt

customer_reviews.title: Love it:)
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Going to purchase a second one for my son. Bought this one for my apartment. Highly recommend!:)
customer_reviews.author: nurset

customer_reviews.title: I had to clean pretty much my whole kitchen after removing the microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave ended up disappointing twice. The second one I bought to replace the first that stopped working ended up charring food and put this nasty smoke and film all over my kitchen. I had to clean pretty much my whole kitchen after removing the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Young

customer_reviews.title: not only black
customer_reviews.text: found a white microwave at last! small kitchens don't need black or stainless steel appliances ; satisfied with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: Judith M

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied customer.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and I got it so quickly. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L Mann

customer_reviews.title: Would give it 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY this microwave!!!! I had it for only 2 months when a piece of metal became exposed , causing sparking every time we tried to use it. Now the only thing it's good for is as an oversized bread box!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Theroux

customer_reviews.title: It works well need a exctra light so see the ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well need a exctra light so see the display, that is the only thing what is a clinch
customer_reviews.author: Waltraud Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY AS DESCRIBED. COULD USE AN EASIER TO READ TOUCH PANEL, MAYBE A WHITE BACKGROUND?
customer_reviews.author: T-Dub

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My microwave arrived 2 days early! Easy to use, my last sharp microwave lasted 15 years that is why I ordered another. , great product !
customer_reviews.author: mary miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy to use and small enough to fit in my pantry.
customer_reviews.author: imagonner

customer_reviews.title: Microwave doesn't sit level on it's front feet
customer_reviews.text: I would give it a 4 because the microwave does not sit level and there is no way to adjust the front feet. I had to put a small sticky pad to level the front of the microwave or it would tip when touched on the top. Otherwise it is a great microwave as far as cooking and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: G E Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave for my son's room. He loves it and plans on taking it with him when he moves out to go to college.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Marie

customer_reviews.title: its awesome love how simple it is
customer_reviews.text: its awesome love how simple it is. If you want a normal microwave that fits anywhere but isn't to small this is your guy.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: She is very happy with the microwave and we had no issues with ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my Mother who uses the microwave every day to heat meals and warm up coffee. She is very happy with the microwave and we had no issues with shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Haig

customer_reviews.title: Quit 27 days after I got it!! RIP off
customer_reviews.text: Was fine the whole 27 days before it quit!! Junk!
customer_reviews.author: order66

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really wonderful appearance. Fit perfectly in area and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Eva DeShay

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 13 months. Won't turn on. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: TravelWriter

customer_reviews.title: Great size; effective microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great size; effective microwave; if it had an audible signal eliminator like my last Sharp, it would have gotten five stars!!!!! Hate to listen to all that beeping!
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Price is good for the quality received.
customer_reviews.text: Good price, compact in size for limited space, without sacrificing the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Chang

customer_reviews.title: Basic and functional
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller and basic than advertised. It's functional but nothing to get excited about.
customer_reviews.author: Alston

customer_reviews.title: Easy to figure out
customer_reviews.text: I never have problems with this microwave-had one for 20 years,then got this.Easy to figure out,good cooking and like a member of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Its a simple procedure to work the oven. Many reviews warned of the light which does not come on when you open the door. The light only works when your cooking. Its nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: judy oldham ufier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: sharp did it agen rock on with the good buy
customer_reviews.author: anthony hallock

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Much Standard for its Price
customer_reviews.text: The 3 stars here should not be interpreted as a poor evaluation. It's just that this microwave doesn't have anything more than is typical in its price range, either in terms of features or performance. It doesn't stand out from the crowd in any aspect.
customer_reviews.author: ElbeauTop Contributor: BBQ Styles

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is not a very good one. It over heats even if you are trying to defrost something.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love my microwave. Besides being easy to use and easy to clean, it adds elegance to my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: carol cohen

product_meta.title: SHARP Black Carousel 1.1 Cu. Ft. 1000W Countertop Microwave Oven (ISTA 6 Packaging), Cubic Foot, 1000 Watts
feature_bullets: Mid-sized 1. 1 Cu. Ft. Capacity microwave oven for countertop use
Removable 11. 2-Inch glass carousel turntable for even cooking
Touch control panel with green LED display, clock, timer and child safety lock
1000 watts of power with 10 cooking power levels
Convenient “+30 Sec” key for instant start
